name: main

definition.annotation: This workflow takes a VCF dataset of variants produced by any of the variant calling workflows in https://github.com/galaxyproject/iwc/tree/main/workflows/sars-cov-2-variant-calling and generates tabular lists of variants by Samples and by Variant, and an overview plot of variants and their allele-frequencies.
definition.name: Generic variation analysis reporting

0.annotation: Variation data in VCF format. Can be the output of any of the workflows in https://github.com/galaxyproject/iwc/tree/main/workflows/sars-cov-2-variant-calling

inputs.description: Variation data in VCF format. Can be the output of any of the workflows in https://github.com/galaxyproject/iwc/tree/main/workflows/sars-cov-2-variant-calling
inputs.name: Variation data to report

0.label: Variation data to report
0.name: Input dataset collection

1.annotation: Allele Frequency Filter. This is the minimum allele frequency required for variants to be included in the reports.

inputs.description: Allele Frequency Filter. This is the minimum allele frequency required for variants to be included in the reports.
inputs.name: AF Filter

1.label: AF Filter
1.name: Input parameter

2.annotation: Depth Filter. This is the minimum depth of all alignments at a variant site.

inputs.description: Depth Filter. This is the minimum depth of all alignments at a variant site.
inputs.name: DP Filter

2.label: DP Filter
2.name: Input parameter

3.annotation: Depth Filter for variant allele. This is the minimum depth of alignments supporting a variant.

inputs.description: Depth Filter for variant allele. This is the minimum depth of alignments supporting a variant.
inputs.name: DP_ALT Filter

3.label: DP_ALT Filter
3.name: Input parameter

5.name: Compose text parameter value
5.tool_state: {"components": [{"__index__": 0, "param_type": {"select_param_type": "text", "__current_case__": 0, "component_value": "( ( DP4[2] + DP4[3] ) < ( "}}, {"__index__": 1, "param_type": {"select_param_type": "float", "__current_case__": 2, "component_value": {"__class__": "ConnectedValue"}}}, {"__index__": 2, "param_type": {"select_param_type": "text", "__current_case__": 0, "component_value": " * DP ) ) | ( DP < "}}, {"__index__": 3, "param_type": {"select_param_type": "integer", "__current_case__": 1, "component_value": {"__class__": "ConnectedValue"}}}, {"__index__": 4, "param_type": {"select_param_type": "text", "__current_case__": 0, "component_value": " ) | ( ( AF * DP ) < ( "}}, {"__index__": 5, "param_type": {"select_param_type": "integer", "__current_case__": 1, "component_value": {"__class__": "ConnectedValue"}}}, {"__index__": 6, "param_type": {"select_param_type": "text", "__current_case__": 0, "component_value": " - 0.5 ) )"}}], "__page__": null, "__rerun_remap_job_id__": null}

8.name: SnpSift Extract Fields
8.tool_state: {"empty_text": ".", "extract": "CHROM POS FILTER REF ALT DP AF DP4 SB EFF[*].IMPACT EFF[*].FUNCLASS EFF[*].EFFECT EFF[*].GENE EFF[*].CODON EFF[*].AA EFF[*].TRID DP4[2] DP4[3]", "input": {"__class__": "ConnectedValue"}, "one_effect_per_line": "true", "separator": "", "__page__": null, "__rerun_remap_job_id__": null}

action_arguments.newname: Extracted variants with filtered and renamed effects and AF recalculated
Extracted variants with highest impact effects
Fully processed variants collection for reporting
Filtered variants of all samples with stats
Filtered variants of all samples with per-position stats

readme:
Generic variation analysis reporting
--------------------------------------

This workflow takes table of variants produced by any of the variant calling workflows in
https://github.com/galaxyproject/iwc/tree/main/workflows/variant-calling
and generates a list of variants by Samples and by Variant.
changelog:
# Changelog

- Fix author in dockstore

## [0.1]

- Initial version generic variation analysis reporting workflow
